service.name: job-to-scenario-pipeline
service.description: Autonomous business development engine that converts job board opportunities into revenue-generating scenarios

steps.name: setup-postgres-schema
steps.run: if [ -f initialization/storage/postgres/schema.sql ]; then psql -h localhost -p ${RESOURCE_PORTS[postgres]} -U postgres -d postgres -f initialization/storage/postgres/schema.sql 2>/dev/null || echo '  Database schema already exists'; else echo '  Schema file will be created'; fi

steps.name: build-api
steps.run: cd api && go mod download && go build -o job-to-scenario-pipeline-api .

steps.name: build-ui
steps.run: if [ -f ui/package.json ]; then cd ui && npm run build; else echo 'UI workspace missing, skipping build'; fi

steps.name: setup-vector-search
steps.run: if command -v curl >/dev/null && curl -s http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[qdrant]}/collections >/dev/null 2>&1; then curl -X PUT "http://localhost:${RESOURCE_PORTS[qdrant]}/collections/proposals" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"vectors": {"size": 1536, "distance": "Cosine"}}' >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; echo '  Qdrant collection for proposals setup'; else echo '  Qdrant not available, similarity search disabled'; fi

steps.name: setup-huginn-agent
steps.run: if [ -f initialization/automation/huginn/upwork-scraper.json ]; then echo '  Huginn agent configuration ready for injection'; else echo '  Huginn agent will be configured manually'; fi

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run:
echo '🚀 Job-to-Scenario Pipeline initialized
  📊 Dashboard: http://localhost:${UI_PORT}
  🌐 API: http://localhost:${API_PORT}
  🎯 CLI: job-to-scenario --help
  📂 Jobs: ./data/

💡 Import jobs with:
  job-to-scenario import manual --text "Build a React app"
  job-to-scenario import screenshot --file job.png
  job-to-scenario list --state pending'

steps.name: start-api
steps.description: Start Go API server in background

steps.name: start-huginn-agent
steps.run: echo '  Huginn agent should be configured separately via Huginn UI'

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run:
echo '🚀 Job Pipeline running:
  📊 Dashboard: http://localhost:$UI_PORT
  📡 API: http://localhost:$API_PORT
  🎯 CLI: job-to-scenario --help

📝 Process jobs:
  job-to-scenario import manual --text "Job description"
  job-to-scenario research --batch-size 5
  job-to-scenario approve <job-id>
  job-to-scenario list --state evaluated

📂 Monitor states:
  ls data/pending/*.yaml
  ls data/evaluated/*.yaml
  ls data/completed/*.yaml'
steps.description: Display service URLs and usage information

steps.name: archive-old-jobs
steps.run: find data/completed -name '*.yaml' -mtime +30 -exec mv {} data/archive/ \; && echo 'Archived jobs older than 30 days'

steps.name: backup-before-clean
steps.run: mkdir -p backup/$(date +%Y%m%d) && cp -r data backup/$(date +%Y%m%d)/ && echo 'Backup created in backup/$(date +%Y%m%d)/'
steps.description: Backup all job data before cleaning

postgres.description: Store jobs, research reports, proposals, and state history

ollama.description: LLM for research analysis and proposal generation

browserless.description: Screenshot OCR for manual job entry

qdrant.description: Semantic search for similar past proposals
